resources.string: A list of the phone numbers to be notified in an emergency
A list of numbers to be called in an emergency, (prioritized from left to right)
A list of email addresses to be notified
Time till the sms and email contacts are notified (all at once)
Time till the emergency contacts are called in order of priority
Adjust the slider bars to change the time from 0 seconds upto 300 seconds
Please list the contact information in order. From high priority (first) to low priority (last)
